lines.text: Lady, aren't you a little tired of playing God?
Maybe you'd like to eliminate me?
I'd love too.
What are you waiting for?
The right time. The right place.
Dr. Tsu is a hundred years ahead of her time and it is characteristic of human beings to resist progress.
I'll bet you get your kicks playing with guns.
I don't PLAY... with guns.
Doc, I'd hate to come to you with a headache.
You've got great legs baby.
Thank you.
But there too long.
Oh.
Yeah. I don't like long legs. They get in the way.
Well we will see about keeping them out of the way.
I think I will take THAT one.

[Pointing a gun in her face]
Hands off bitch! He's mine.
Tonight only.
You know, that's what I like about you baby, you're unpredictable.

[Pointing a gun at him]
I am predictable about one thing... I never miss.
You won this time Mr. Harber... but just remember, like all great minds, we can not avoid our destiny.
